name: Dan O'Prey
cooked: This forum is for bitcoin discussions. What you’re describing is not bitcoin and is philosophically opposed to bitcoin, so you are not going to get support from anyone in the community here.
topic_title: Paralel Bitcoin only for conscious living individuals
